price: ߓߊ߲߬ߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߕߊ߯ߣߌߛߊ߬ߦߌ ߖߊ߬ߡߣߊ ߟߎ߬ ߢߊߝߍ߬ ߏ߬ ߞߊߣߵߌ ߜߍߙߍ߲ߞߍ߫ ߘߋ߬
arabic: لَا يَغُرَّنَّكَ تَقَلُّبُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: lā yaghurrannaka taqallubu alladhīna kafarū fī al-bilādi
